thread.title: BRIEF-Genius Brands Says Rebecca Hershinger, CFO, Notified Co That She Would Voluntarily Resign

title: BRIEF-Genius Brands Says Rebecca Hershinger, CFO, Notified Co That She Would Voluntarily Resign

organizations.name: notified co that she would voluntarily resign reuters staff

text: March 12, 2018 / 10:12 PM / Updated 33 minutes ago BRIEF-Genius Brands Says Rebecca Hershinger, CFO, Notified Co That She Would Voluntarily Resign Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Genius Brands International Inc : * GENIUS BRANDS SAYS REBECCA HERSHINGER, CFO, NOTIFIED CO THAT SHE WOULD VOLUNTARILY RESIGN FROM HER POSITION - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2FvYiUT ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
